name: Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-19P
description:
The Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-19 is a Soviet second generation, single-seat, twinjet fighter aircraft, the world's first mass-produced supersonic aircraft. 

It was the first Soviet production aircraft capable of supersonic speeds in level flight.

The P version equipped with RP-1 Izumrud radar in the nose and armed with two 23 mm NR-23 cannons in the wings.
